title: Catherine Mulligan, Ph.D. FHEA – Digital Transformation | Digital Resilience | Digital Sustainability  | LinkedIn TopVoice | ex-WEF fellow | ex-UNSG HLP on Digital Cooperation | All views expressed here are personal views only | LinkedIn

quotes: The consultation will be open for 6 weeks until 18 July 2025.
Promoting interoperability across borders, rather than full harmonisation, has been the approach adopted by the EU in this regard since the Clean Energy Package.

Given the fact that Member States have to submit information about their national data management models in a few weeks, and given the fact that new implementing acts in this field are coming up, we decided to organise an online debate and discuss the matter with experts from the European Commission, national competent authorities, system operators and innovative companies.
